response.headline: Concrete etch kit with easy burst pouch application system - Dark Gray color option
response.summary: Kit includes roller, concrete etch, decorative chips, instructional sheet, and easy mix polyuramine burst pouch. Three-step process: tightly roll pouch until seal bursts, shake contents for 2-3 minutes, cut corner and pour following application instructions.

image_details.key_interest: Easy burst pouch mixing system with three-step application process
